page_content: The page offers short training sessions for instructors on various topics related to vocational training.
The page is a competence center for financial and controlling issues in the cantonal administration.
The page provides essential information for vocational trainers, including responsibilities and how to access current information.
The page offers modular training sessions for vocational or practical trainers to efficiently use educational tools.
The page describes a project group supporting the introduction of a vocational training reform in Central Switzerland.
The page provides repetition questions for vocational training courses and allows trainers to access the answers via a tool.
The page provides information on the ÖREB Cadastre, an official system detailing public-law property restrictions in the Canton of Lucerne.
The page offers training sessions for vocational trainers to prepare them for the BiVo 2023 educational reform.
The page provides an overview of the BiVo 2023 educational reform, including its implementation and requirements for vocational trainers and trainees.
The page provides contact information for the VWBZ office, including phone numbers and staff details.
The page provides location maps for various examination centers in different cantons.
The page outlines various special educational pathways, including shortened and extended vocational training courses.
The page provides a timeline for the construction and renovation of an instruction building, expected to be completed by 2028.
The page offers optional practical modules in the areas of personnel and finance for third-year trainees who lack opportunities for practical training in their companies.
The page serves as the official commercial register for the Canton of Lucerne, providing legal and economic information about companies.
The page provides information on "Überbetrieblichen Kurse" (inter-company courses), including their structure, costs, and how they are organized through an Extranet tool.
The page provides information on various platforms used for vocational training, including login instructions and guides for both learners and trainers.
The page outlines the responsibilities of vocational trainers in creating an educational program for each learner, which serves as a planning tool and basis for final exams.
The page provides information on the value-added compensation in the Canton of Lucerne, including legal foundations and guidelines.
